title: Starting up Youtube!!!
body:
Hey guys im an x-challenger, Im currently trying to start up a youtube channel! Im Looking for anyone else who does youtube and wants to help eachother out :).  also would love anyone your help
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCm14MhI_Nl_K36MvaINPZ7Q
Please check it out guys

replies.body: i also do youtube with 2 other friends shearch Blame The Games we just started today but have no vids :D i would love to help eachother out :D

tbh unless you're a pro player on a major region or you play something particularly uncommon/gimmicky, people won't be interested in your channel. You need to bring more to the table than that or people won't bother watching you over people from better regions (let's face it, the highest Elos in OCE don't really compare to the highest Elos in the larger regions).

So if you don't have a gimmicky champ to show off, try adding more flavour using other methods. Strong play accompanied with dubstep is boring and overdone. Try strong play accompanied with goofy commentary or something - even that's overdone, but at least it's a little more interesting. You're a smart fella, I'm sure you can think of even better ways to add flavour to your videos.
